Developer Terms of Use
des:
With PanL Smart Living Skill, you can interact with your PanL devices by voice. To get started, please follow below steps:

1. Searching PanL Smart Living App from Google store or Apple store, then install it on your phone. 
2. Using Smart Living App to sign-up new PanL user. Please use the email account that is used to log-in Alexa App to sign-up a new PanL user. 
3. Following PanL System Guideline to setup your PanL Hub with the registered PanL user. 
4. Log-in Alexa App, go to Skill page and select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your skill with PanL System. 
5. Once you have linked the skill with PanL account and PanL System, and if the PanL devices are setup properly according to PanL System Guideline, you will need to "discover" PanL devices. You can say the following to discover PanL devices.

"Alexa, discover my devices"

PanL system can support various devices based on the PanL Hub configuration, like Hue Light devices, Zigbee buttons, Curtain devices, and so on. 

6. After device discovery, you can say following to control devices which are already discovered.

Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light
Alexa, turn off Kitchen Light
Alexa, turn on Bed Room
